title: Online Discussion-Based Science Project Course for Self-Directed MOOC Design

context.prior_knowledge: Competency in grasping fundamental science concepts
context.additional_context: MOOC design for practitioners to autonomously conduct science projects in smartphone-based limited environments, with asynchronous discussion boards as the core rather than real-time interaction

learning_goals: Complete science-themed PBL assignments with over 80% completion rate through discussion board collaboration in smartphone environments within four weeks
Achieve at least Level 2 on a three-tier evaluation scale for science theory application skills based on video lectures and discussion feedback provided in MOOCs
Learners can write at least three constructive feedbacks and derive one project improvement plan through the peer assessment system.

resources: Modular video materials (30 minutes per module, 2 per week)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
